${ModID}:ShedWeight.NAME: Shed Weight
${ModID}:ShedWeight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL If that card was *Unplayable, draw a card.

${ModID}:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
${ModID}:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each point of Energy missing.

${ModID}:Ambition.NAME: Ambition
${ModID}:Ambition.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand and copy it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Ambition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand and copy it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Diehard.NAME: Diehard
${ModID}:Diehard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Next turn, gain 1 Weak and Frail.

${ModID}:EldritchBlast.NAME: Eldritch Blast
${ModID}:EldritchBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a Power, return this from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:DeathWish.NAME: Death Wish
${ModID}:DeathWish.DESCRIPTION: If your HP is above 50%, lose !M! HP. NL Gain !M! Strength and *Vigor.

${ModID}:KillerInstinct.NAME: Killer Instinct
${ModID}:KillerInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Startup: Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile.
${ModID}:KillerInstinct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Startup: Shuffle !M! copies of this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
${ModID}:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain Temporary HP equal to your draw pile size. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Masterstroke.NAME: Masterstroke
${ModID}:Masterstroke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Strength and Dexterity affect this card !M! times.
